response.overview: This is the story of a dreaded headman who does not hesitate to torture the farmers in the village. Even after killing many farmers of the village, he is not satisfied. There is a lot of fear among the common man and the farmers to due to his terror. Following the path of justice, a farmer’s son grows up in that village. When he came to know that headman killed his parents, so he decides to kill the headman. Watch further to know how Koshi’s Putra takes revenge from the headman, burning in the fire of vengeance
response.title: Koshi Putra
